items.desc: Level 35 Pants. Having a blowhole wrapped around your thigh reminds you of your college days.

items.name: Surprise Grub
items.desc: Gulantis love hide and seek. Maybe this little trick will scare one! Embiggens your Gulanti to POWERFUL SIZE!

items.name: Puzzlecube
items.desc: Take your Gallum to the next level OF PUZZLING ACTION! Embiggens your Gallum to POWERFUL SIZE!

items.name: Fishiminea
items.desc: It can hold in a lot of heat, though it gets sticky after a lot of use. It could use a good rub-down from time to time.

items.name: Jackweaver
items.desc: It pulls together all manner of things, strips them into strips, and weaves them together into a weave. BRILLIANT!

items.name: Compressor
items.desc: All you need is the right attitude, a bit of elbow grease, and an elaborate workstation made of the skin of giant inflatable aliens.

items.name: Centrifuge
items.desc: Spinning. It makes the world go round.

items.name: Chemwand
items.desc: It's only after you've burned everything that you're free to do anything. Grants a 10% chance to set enemies on fire.

items.name: Shivly
items.desc: Imbue your attacks with THROAK TENTACLE POWERS! Grants a 10% chance on melee attack to deal ice damage.

items.name: Retina Mounted Spice Injector
items.desc: You can see clearly now; the pain is gone. Reduces cooldowns of all items by 15%.

items.name: Optimized Gamepad
items.desc: Now with firmified grippy handles XTREME! 360 noscope resource harvesting YOLO! Grants a 15% chance when breaking resources to gain a turbo run speed boost.

items.name: Wealthy Statuette
items.desc: This is how you know you've made it. Grants a 10% chance when breaking resources to find double the normal amount of components!

items.name: Heating Pad
items.desc: Keeping warm is for babies. And you, apparently. Grants 20% resistance to ice damage and freezing effects.

items.name: Weakness Detector
items.desc: It's time to take a huge crit all over the place! Increases your critical strike damage by 25%.

items.name: Bloodball
items.desc: Just having this beautiful thing around makes you want to rub all up on your enemies and steal their lives away! Grants a 5% chance to steal health from enemies on melee attack.

items.name: Rave Tube
items.desc: You'll be the life of any party with this fancy Rave Tube! Unless you're a cop. Grants a 5% chance on melee attack per second to gain a turbo speed boost.

items.name: Clawbox
items.desc: You ain't got time to bleed, but your enemies sure do! Grants a 10% chance on melee attack to cause your target to bleed.

items.name: Beakler
items.desc: With the right amount of poison, you can overcome just about anything! Grants a 10% chance to poison enemies on melee attacks.

items.name: Shockprod
items.desc: This thing is shockingly good at shocking the socks off of things. Don't lick the tip. Grants a 10% chance on melee attack to deal electric damage!

items.name: Medicine Bag
items.desc: Rubbing this sack all over your face should cure what ails ya! Grants 20% poison damage resistance.

items.name: Grounder
items.desc: One foot on the ground, and the other on the grounder. Grants 20% electric damage resistance.

items.name: Mercurial Batshoes
items.desc: Keeping these around reminds you of your days as an Olympic sprinter. Ah, simpler times. Increases run speed by 5%!

items.name: Nasty Lure
items.desc: The smell reminds you of a frat party you went to once. But it'll increase the number of fish in schools by 40%, which is nice.

items.name: The Heft
items.desc: It's so hefty, but you already know. Grants your melee attacks a 3% chance per second to stun enemies.

items.name: Efficiency Engine
items.desc: With a bit of extra thought, you can always do things better. Grants a 5% chance on swing to break resources apart completely.

items.name: Cleavebat
items.desc: This bat will give you all the leverage you need! 75% chance to hit nearby identical resources when harvesting.

items.name: Motivator
items.desc: Sometimes it just takes a little fire under the tush. Increases move speed by 15% when health is low!

items.name: Clarm
items.desc: Now your pet's tiny arms can get some work done! Increases your pet's damage by 20%.

items.name: Searchlight
items.desc: Show your pet where to strike! Increases your pet's critical hit chance by 20%.

items.name: Nematoblaster
items.desc: Harness the power of Throaks to blast a hostile enemy with THE COLDITUDE OF ICE! Deals 100% of your DPS as ice damage.

items.name: Terrifying Fetish
items.desc: One look at this horrible thing will get that adrenaline pumping! Provides a turbo speed boost for 10 seconds.

items.name: Life Enforcer
items.desc: Using ethically questionable stem cell research, you're able to restore 50% of your missing HP. Now that's progress!

items.name: Shockstache
items.desc: The moustache of a Bamli builds up static charges so fast, you'd be crazy NOT to weaponize it! Deals 100% of your DPS as lightning damage to your target and all nearby targets as well.

items.name: Plague Injector
items.desc: Whacking an enemy with this thing will poison it and everyone and everything it loves! Deals 100% of your DPS as poison damage to your target and nearby targets.

items.name: Swapscope
items.desc: By focusing light into a tiny point onto your retina, you're able to instantly trade places with your pet somehow. There's a lot of science packed into this thing.

items.name: Fingarang
items.desc: It'll do tremendous damage to your enemies and make them bleed, but be careful catching it on the way back, or you might lose... a finger. Applies a bleed to enemies for 100% of your DPS.

items.name: DBot
items.desc: At the press of a button, DBot will come to your rescue, making you invincible! But he gets tired easily, so don't wear him out.

items.name: Slowball Machine
items.desc: Fling balls of packed snow and ice at your enemies, dealing 70% of your DPS as ice damage and freezing all of their legs in the area!

items.name: Thundercall
items.desc: Create a MICROSTORM right over your own head! The storm will strike enemies with lightning every second while the storm persists, each strike damaging for 75% of your DPS.

items.name: Big Red
items.desc: They say the safest part of a raging inferno is the point of origin. That's probably not true, but it couldn't hurt to test it. Burns enemies for 100% of your DPS!

items.name: Laser Leash
items.desc: Draws a laser between you and your pet, which you can drag across enemies to damage them for 75% of your DPS.

items.name: Jollyfloor
items.desc: It squishes between your toes when you stride across it barefoot, and it sounds a bit like that squealing sound of rubbing a balloon.

items.name: Myelar Floor
items.desc: It's velvety and soft, like soft velvet. Rubbing your head on it makes you feel relaxed.

items.name: Golden Floor
items.desc: It is slippery when wet.

items.name: Smashblossom Floor
items.desc: It seems very resilient, almost as if you could smash it repeatedly with a blossom to no effect.

items.name: Karboan Floor
items.desc: It's so hard that if you fell face-first on it, it would break. Your face, not the floor.

items.name: Lonsdaleite Floor
items.desc: It's pretty hard to walk on, on account of it being made of huge balls. But hey, it's the price you pay to walk on huge balls.

items.name: Jollywall
items.desc: You feel like if you ran at it hard enough, it would give way. Better get started!

items.name: Myelar Wall
items.desc: It squishes when you press your face all up on it. Probably not the soundest of construction materials, but what are you gonna do?

items.name: Golden Wall
items.desc: It's so shiny you can see your reflection in it! That must be useful, somehow.

items.name: Smashblossom Wall
items.desc: It's more dense than the densest of black holes. Fortunately it isn't one, or you would have fallen in by now.

items.name: Karboan Wall
items.desc: It's tough enough to withstand a hurricane, but gentle enough that you could trust it to look after your kids.

items.name: Lonsdaleite Wall
items.desc: It's the strongest material in the universe. It makes no sense that you were able to craft it into this shape.

items.name: Flatstone Door
items.desc: Made of the toughest flatstone around, this door will keep all your stuff safe from burglars!

items.name: Jollydoor
items.desc: When it retracts, red goo squirts out. It smells like candy!

items.name: Myelar Door
items.desc: This door probably couldn't do much to keep anything out, but it sure feels great!

items.name: Golden Door
items.desc: The sun reflects off it in such a blindingly bright way, it's hard to even open the thing. How pretty!

items.name: Smashblossom Door
items.desc: The tough knobs make it hard to close and open, but they also make it easier, you know, in some respects.

items.name: Karboan Door
items.desc: It's tough. It's rugged. It's the all new Karboan Door, straight from your very own Tumbler!

items.name: Lonsdaleite Door
items.desc: Nobody can get through this door! Unless they open it.

items.name: BS SSSS SS5
items.desc: You are using the trusty Bureau of Shipping Self-Sustaining Survival Station Series S-5! It'll get you started on this hostile alien planet.

items.name: Recipe
items.desc: There is KNOWLEDGE inside this box!

items.name: NPC
items.desc: An NPC!

items.name: Pearlscale Anchor
items.desc: It might be good to build a few of these, in case you end up with a cruise ship in your possession.

items.name: Crystalline Bookcase
items.desc: This is where you keep all the books you tell everyone you've read!

items.name: Crystal Throne
items.desc: This makes you momentarily forget how unimportant you are!

items.name: Turbo Shrine
items.desc: Touching this shrine makes your legs feel all tingly. Like that feeling when you sit on the toilet for too long, only different.

items.name: Time Warp Shrine
items.desc: Fondling this shrine makes everything seem REALLY BORING.

items.name: Logbaby
items.desc: It rocks back and forth, staring at you with wide eyes. Looking at it makes you uncomfortable.

items.name: Exposed Root of Maarla
items.desc: A root of the plant known as Maarla. It hums with the energy of life!

items.name: Expression of Maarla
items.desc: A bud of the giant plant called Maarla. The petals glow with a radiant orange.

items.name: Flower of Maarla
items.desc: A fully blossomed flower of Maarla. Its purple glow fills you with warmth and craving for burritos.

items.name: Tendraam Torch
items.desc: The Tendraam use these small buds of Maarla as light sources at night.

items.name: Fractured Flatstone
items.desc: A shoot of Maarla that has burst through a flatstone boulder.

items.name: Gastrolith Path
items.desc: Walking on it gives your toes immense pleasure. YEAH, TOES!

items.name: Blueglow Beachball
items.desc: It's huge and ball-shaped!

items.name: Beachball
items.desc: If this hit you in the face at a high speed, it would be hilarious.

items.name: Greenglow Beachball
items.desc: If this hit you in the face at a high speed in the dark, it would be hilarious.

items.name: Potted Straddlebark
items.desc: It's straddlebark in a pot. WHAT MORE DO YOU WANT?

items.name: Vlapkeg
items.desc: Standing near it makes you want to throw your hands in the air, almost as if you simply don't care.

items.name: Telescope
items.desc: Putting your eye up to it leaves a gross ring of goo around your eye socket.

items.name: Pearlscale HoverBuoy
items.desc: It floats in the water, despite being made of ultra-dense materials. There must be some science in there!

items.name: Jollamp
items.desc: The glowing orbs are hypnotic. You can feel yourself drooling as you watch it.

items.name: Evileye
items.desc: It stares into the soul of everything in the universe.

items.name: Bamli Egg
items.desc: Even before it is fully hatched, the Bamli sports a proud moustache.

items.name: Blastcrab Egg
items.desc: It's hot to the touch. Like an egg, but one that's hot to the touch.

items.name: Gallum Egg
items.desc: The egg is made of crystal chunks, just like its parents. It seems shy. You know, for an egg.

items.name: Glaser Egg
items.desc: While being carried, the egg makes high-pitched gurgling noises.

items.name: Glidopus Egg
items.desc: No matter how much you dab it with paper towels, it remains perpetually moist.

items.name: Glutterfly Egg
items.desc: Something adorable is probably going to come out of this. That, or a hideous flying insect.

items.name: Gulanti Egg
items.desc: The blowhole must be there for a reason. What that might be... nobody knows.

items.name: Lyff Egg
items.desc: When threatened, the egg makes a high-pitched ululating sound. Like father, like son.

items.name: Satgat Egg
items.desc: This shell looks the same as the exoskeleton of the parents!

items.name: Shirk Egg
items.desc: The baby Shirk inside screeches violently.

items.name: Slurb Egg
items.desc: You have to be careful while handling it, so as to not impale your entire everything.

items.name: Snorble Egg
items.desc: It squishes like an airbag. It's almost as if there's nothing inside it...

items.name: Tartil Egg
items.desc: It gets stuck to your hand when you touch it. Hopefully it's not permanent.

items.name: Throak Egg
items.desc: It wobbles like jelly when you slap it. You should probably not slap it.

items.name: Vomma Egg
items.desc: The egg is covered in a sticky substance, and it smells like the bathroom of a bar at closing time.

items.name: Wat Egg
items.desc: The egg seems ready to zoom off into the sunset.

items.name: Wojack Egg
items.desc: It's covered in suckers! Probably to keep it attached to... whatever.

items.name: Wompit Egg
items.desc: You'd think Wompits wouldn't lay eggs, on account of them being mammals. You'd be wrong.

items.name: Zug Egg
items.desc: It crackles with electricity. You get tiny static shocks the whole time you're holding it.

items.name: Glidopus Incubator
items.desc: This is going to get moist.

items.name: Glutterfly Incubator
items.desc: As the saying goes, if you want to hatch a Glutterfly, you gotta build one of these.

items.name: Tartil Incubator
items.desc: Tartil eggs stick to everything they touch. INCLUDING THIS!

items.name: Wat Incubator
items.desc: You figure it's about time you raised your own pointy-fingered bat creature.

items.name: Wompit Incubator
items.desc: This should keep a Wompit egg at just the right temperature to make it hatch!

items.name: Zug Incubator
items.desc: Be sure not to stick your tongue on this while it's hatching. That'd be gross.

items.name: Shirk Incubator
items.desc: Ever wanted a shrieking bird shark following you around? Now's your chance!

items.name: Blastcrab Incubator
items.desc: How hot does a Blastcrab egg need to be? Probably... probably hot.

items.name: Gallum Incubator
items.desc: This might be tricky, on account of the egg attempting to teleport away all the time.

items.name: Glaser Incubator
items.desc: Be sure to put the egg in right-side up, or you'll end up with an upside-down Glaser.

items.name: Slurb Incubator
items.desc: You never know when you need a spiked flying snail at your back or front.

items.name: Gulanti Incubator
items.desc: You know what makes for great padding? Giant, squirming larvae.

items.name: Lyff Incubator
items.desc: There's no way this will keep a Lyff egg intact. But you're going to try it anyway.

items.name: Bamli Incubator
items.desc: With a pile of grenamel and a bit of TLC, you can hatch just about anything!

items.name: Satgat Incubator
items.desc: Flying barrel bugs with tiny heads make great pets. You read that on the internet once.

items.name: Snorble Incubator
items.desc: With the right amount of blube, you can fit a Snorble egg into just about anything.

items.name: Throak Incubator
items.desc: How do you hatch a Throak egg? No, seriously... is this right?

items.name: Vomma Incubator
items.desc: There's no way to know whether this will work. Actually, there is. LET'S DO THIS!

items.name: Wojack Incubator
items.desc: What if the Wojack egg DIGS THROUGH THE INCUBATOR?

items.name: Lognest
items.desc: It uses extremely soft and well-insulated wood to keep creatures and their eggs warm!

items.name: Vlappy Nest
items.desc: It's the perfect combination of soft, moist, and bone-crushingly firm!

items.name: Smashy Nest
items.desc: Spikes? No, those are... love-pokers.

items.name: Tangy Chewing Gum
items.desc: THE FLAVOR MAKES YOUR MOUTH EXPLODE WITH HAPPINESS! For a couple seconds. Restores 6,521 HP.

items.name: Spongy Podcake
items.desc: It smells like something that died that ate something that also died after living a full life. Sends your pet into a berserking rampage for 3 minutes!

items.name: Larvy Bunnycake
items.desc: This little treat really gets the LEG BLOOD FLOWIN! Boosts your pet's run speed for 3 minutes!

items.name: Bawgaporter
items.desc: This remarkable contraption allows you to instantly warp to the Bawg!

items.name: Blulch
items.desc: It's a squishy pile of organic goopy chunk part pieces. It's warm!

items.name: Permafrost
items.desc: It's pretty frosty, and moderately perma, too.

items.name: Furdle Blulch
items.desc: This RICH COMPOUND OF BLEH should work well for cultivating a Bawg garden!

items.name: Furdle Frost
items.desc: Anything from the Tundra should be happy growing in this DELICIOUS FROST!

items.name: Healing Shrine
items.desc: It'll get all kinds of jibblies out of your blood tubes!

items.name: Bait Shrine
items.desc: Your pole is totally gonna be so awesome for the fishings after you touch this.

items.name: Flight Shrine
items.desc: Prodding this shrine makes your toes feel all twinkly toesy mctwinkle.

items.name: Harvest Shrine
items.desc: GET TO WORK!

items.name: Haircone
items.desc: This makes a giant hair emerge from the ground. Why? HAIRCONE!

items.name: Spur Seed
items.desc: Jamming this into the ground will cause a spur to appear over time. Gross, but effective.

items.name: Brubus Codewall
items.desc: Brubus congregants will often write their meeting minutes on golden tablets. You know, for posterity.

items.name: Brubus Debate Lamp
items.desc: To sustain debates into the depths of the COLD NIGHT, Brubus will keep these lamps lit around their congregation.

items.name: Brubus Lectern
items.desc: It's important to have a place from which to shout others down.

items.name: Statue of Bribery
items.desc: The Brubus have tremendous regard for greasing the wheels of democracy.

items.name: Brubus Voting Bucket
items.desc: Write your name and put it in the bucket. It's definitely not a shredder or anything.

items.name: Blollilamp
items.desc: Sometimes the best ideas come from taking two random objects and cramming them together really hard.

items.name: Blotlamp
items.desc: IT'S BLUE AND IT GLOWS. WHAT MORE DO YOU WANT FROM IT.

items.name: Fluorsack
items.desc: For when you need to bathe the world in a delicious purpley glow.

items.name: Lumivase
items.desc: This would go well with your new drapes, or some kinda fashionable stuff like that.

items.name: Smashlight
items.desc: This beautiful piece will keep your other beautiful pieces marginally visible at night.

items.name: Stuffed Bamli
items.desc: When you've bested this many bamlis, you'd best put it on display.

items.name: Stuffed Blastcrab
items.desc: It's still warm to the touch, even after being stuffed!

items.name: Reassembled Gallum
items.desc: When you place your hand on it, you can feel it vibrating and humming slightly.

items.name: Stuffed Glaser
items.desc: If you look closely, you can see old burn marks on the antlers from the heat of its laser!

items.name: Stuffed Gulanti
items.desc: Your hair stands on end as you walk past it. It's either the static or the creepiness.

items.name: Stuffed Lyff
items.desc: It's so realistic, you can almost feel it licking you. ALMOST.

items.name: Stuffed Satgat
items.desc: Even though they are immobile and stuffed, its wings move so fast you cannot see them.

items.name: Stuffed Shirk
items.desc: The beak is so sharp you could cut paper with it, or styrofoam or something.

items.name: Stuffed Slurb
items.desc: Its horribleness haunts your dreams. AND EVEN YOUR NIGHTMARES.

items.name: Stuffed Snorble
items.desc: It takes a lot of work to keep these airbags inflated, but it pays the mortgage.

items.name: Stuffed Tartil
items.desc: The tar never seems to dry, no matter how long it sits. Fortunately, it smells terrible.

items.name: Stuffed Throak
items.desc: The tentacles get stuck on you as you walk past. It's delightful!

items.name: Stuffed Vomma
items.desc: It looks just like the real thing! A dead version of the real thing, anyway.

items.name: Stuffed Wat
items.desc: Its long, slender fingers are still gross to look at.

items.name: Stuffed Wojack
items.desc: OH GOD IT oh it's dead. Heh. For a minute there... ... anyways.

items.name: Stuffed Zug
items.desc: When you gaze upon its face, you are reminded of how stupid it was in life.

items.name: Wobbler
items.desc: When you gotta punch a wobbly picture of your nemesis, you gotta punch a wobbly picture of your nemesis.

items.name: Brain Boost Potion
items.desc: Drinking this cocktail heightens your senses! ALL OF THEM. Puts you in bullet-time for 3 seconds.

items.name: Karboric Shiner
items.desc: It's so firm and glowy! Standing near it makes you feel queasy and nauseous, for some reason.

items.name: Floaty Icelight
items.desc: The power of Flungus keeps this glowing Icequill hovering gently in the air!

items.name: Potted Pyn
items.desc: Now you can chew the eyes off of Pyns any time of the day! But not at night; that'd be weird.

items.name: Potted Perp
items.desc: These perps will add ambience to any room that doesn't already have Perps in it!

items.name: Potted Bunnion
items.desc: These adorable Bunnions scream endlessly until eaten. They're SO CUUUUTE!

items.name: Potted Boreole
items.desc: Once potted, Boreoles stop glowing. Must be something about... sciencey crap...

items.name: Potted Icequill
items.desc: Potted Icequills don't have the same vibrant glow as wild ones. Still, WHATEVER!

items.name: Potted Coppersponge
items.desc: Infinite sponges? INFINITE SPONGES! SPONGE SPONGE SPONGE SPONGE. Sponge.

items.name: Potted Hardcore
items.desc: Probably the most hardcore potted hardcore ever potted.

items.name: Potted Parapod
items.desc: Potted Parapods present prolific parapod production possibilities!

items.name: Geysir Drill
items.desc: This thingamabob will punch a hole in Furdle Frost, digging a permanent Geysir!

items.name: Magmite Queen
items.desc: Her voluptuous insectoid curves attract all the magmite mans!

items.name: Smash Seed
items.desc: When placed in the right environment, this will yield a DELICIOUS Smashblossom!

items.name: Pipeseed
items.desc: Somehow, this turns into pipes. Pipedirt. Pipey pipedirty dirt pipes. PIPE.

items.name: Potted Tusker
items.desc: It makes you feel things when you feel it.

items.name: Nematobomb
items.desc: Deals 100% of your DPS as frost damage and makes your enemies crave hot cocoa!

items.name: Vompole Clusterbomb
items.desc: Harness the explosive power of BABIES! Er... vompoles. Not babies. Deals 250% of your DPS as physical damage!

items.name: Bloodbomb
items.desc: If it bleeds, you can kill it. If it's already bleeding, you probably don't have to. Bleeds enemies for 250% of your DPS!

items.name: Shirknel Bomb
items.desc: The salt gland causes a chemical reaction, and then CHEMISTRY HAPPENS! Deals 250% of your DPS as physical damage!

items.name: The Slurricane
items.desc: Creates a powerful poison cloud that poisons LITERALLY EVERYTHING except for some stuff! Deals 300% of your DPS as poison damage!

items.name: Pincushion Bomb
items.desc: Vigorously poke everything TO DEATH! Deals 200% of your DPS as physical damage!

items.name: Handy Purptorch
items.desc: What, this? IT'S NOT PINK. IT'S FUCHSIA.

items.name: Emerald Hand Torch
items.desc: Fight the darkness with the bright glow of this AMAZING EMERALD TORCH! Order now and we'll throw in a bag of toothpaste.

items.name: Jollysign
items.desc: Disgustingly keep track of all the cool stuff you find!

items.name: Smashy Sign
items.desc: Magellan it up in the Tundra with this fashionable sign!

items.name: Sterling Wompit Essence
items.desc: Holding this object in your hand makes you feel... stompy.

items.name: Ancient Glutterfly Essence
items.desc: Being near this essence makes you feel FLUTTERY AND VIVACIOUS!

items.name: Womplord Essence
items.desc: Gazing upon this amazing whatever it is, you feel compelled to amputate one of your legs and hop around wildly.

items.name: Bloated Glutterfly Essence
items.desc: It vibrates and chirps with the POWER OF GLUTTERFLIES! You get the sense that licking it would kill you.

items.name: Verdant Glidopus Essence
items.desc: Putting this essence in your pocket makes you strangely attracted to Whistleroots.

items.name: Elder Glidopus Essence
items.desc: Holding this object in your hand makes you wish your hand was a tentacle.

items.name: Filthy Tartil Essence
items.desc: This makes you feel sticky, yet delicious. Like some kind of sticky cake or dessert.

items.name: Blood Tartil Essence
items.desc: This sticks to everything IN THE WHOLE UNIVERSE. Except for love, which is an intangible idea that things can't stick to.

items.name: GrandWat Essence
items.desc: This ball of Wat energy rapidly flits around as you approach it! OR DOES IT? Yes, it does.

items.name: Ancient Shadowy Wat Essence
items.desc: Coming near this essence makes you want to poke things with your long, creepy fingers.

items.name: Zug Lug Essence
items.desc: This Zug energy ball makes grating shrieking noises. It's oddly calming!

items.name: Zuguardian Essence
items.desc: This essence crackles with electricity!

items.name: Tempered Vomma Essence
items.desc: Being near this essence makes you want to barf. But... in a good way.

items.name: Sightless Vomma Essence
items.desc: Being near this essence makes you REALLY want to barf. But in a REALLY GOOD way.

items.name: Malicious Throak Essence
items.desc: You feel that if you were to touch it, you would be stung. Only one way to find out!

items.name: Bawgblood Throak Essence
items.desc: Holding this makes you feel like you could just FLOAT AWAY!

items.name: Burnt Snorble Essence
items.desc: This essence gives you the feeling of HURGH BLAGH!

items.name: Depressurized Snorble Essence
items.desc: It feels very light, as if it's full of air! Wait. That's just gas.

items.name: Sensitive Satgat Essence
items.desc: This essence is ADORABLE!

items.name: Desaturated Satgat Essence
items.desc: Being near this essence makes your head feel tiny.

items.name: Sticky Wojack Essence
items.desc: This little ball of Wojack energy makes you want to DIG! DIG INTO THE GERND!

items.name: Bleached Wojack Essence
items.desc: It tingles your toes when you poke it with your toes. Stop poking it with your toes.

items.name: Wily Bamli Essence
items.desc: Just being near this makes you sprout a RAGING MOUSTACHE.

items.name: Raving Bamli Essence
items.desc: Holding this item in your hand makes you crave sugar tremendously. Also, your limbs feel tingly.

items.name: Berg Shirk Essence
items.desc: GREEEEEEEEEEAAAGH AAAAAAAAAAAAK!

items.name: Redwing Shirk Essence
items.desc: Your beak feels beakier just from being near this essence!

items.name: Royal Glaser Essence
items.desc: Holding this essence makes you feel like shooting laser beams from your forehead!

items.name: Greybearded Glaser Essence
items.desc: This essence causes you to crave grass. MMMMMM GRASS HOLY CRAP YEAH!

items.name: Raging Slurb Essence
items.desc: IT'S HORRIBLE!

items.name: Sleepless Slurb Essence
items.desc: This makes you feel terrible about yourself.

items.name: Lyff Broh Essence
items.desc: It's so bouncy and springy!

items.name: Max Lyff Essence
items.desc: When you lick it, you like it.

items.name: Pressurized Blastcrab Essence
items.desc: IT'S SO DANG HOT. OOH OOWEE! HOT HOT HOT! SO HOT RIGHT NOW!

items.name: Liquid-Cooled Blastcrab Essence
items.desc: Touching this essence gives you the vague sense that you are severely burning off your fingers.

items.name: Calcified Gallum Essence
items.desc: It won't stop vibrating. You can think of one good use for this. CALF MASSAGES!

items.name: Monochromatic Gallum Essence
items.desc: You can feel the power coursing through it! OH GOOD LORDY! OH MY! OH MY STARS!

items.name: Jumpy Gulanti Essence
items.desc: This essence makes you want to SING TO THE HEAVENS WITH YOUR GLORIOUS BLOWHOLE!

items.name: Hotblooded Gulanti Essence
items.desc: Your neck feels stretchy when you hold this. Almost TOO stretchy.

items.name: Tundraporter
items.desc: Majestically transports you to the Tundra LIKE A SOARING EAGOLE!

items.name: Wompogo Stick
items.desc: Although Wompits can't ride this on account of having no arms, one will definitely appreciate the thought. Embiggens your Wompit to EPIC SIZE!

items.name: Hivelighter
items.desc: Despite conventional wisdom, Glutterflies have terrible eyesight at night. BUT NOT WITH THIS! Embiggens your Glutterfly to EPIC SIZE!

items.name: Kaglidoscope
items.desc: Glidopus be trippin. Embiggens your Glidopus to EPIC SIZE!

items.name: Ten Tonne Bomb
items.desc: Once this bomb is absorbed into the squishy body of a Tartil, ALL BETS ARE OFF! Embiggens your Tartil to EPIC SIZE!

items.name: Sleeping Bag
items.desc: A growing Wat needs the warmth of a sleep sack! Embiggens your Wat to EPIC SIZE!

items.name: Perpetual Motion Machine
items.desc: Nothing charges up a Zug's chargey parts like a thing that violates the laws of physics! Embiggens your Zug to EPIC SIZE!

items.name: Vommophone
items.desc: You've never puked until you've puked through one of these babies. Embiggens your Vomma to EPIC SIZE!

items.name: Mining Helmet
items.desc: It's good to protect the Noggin when TUNNELING CRAZILY UNDERGROUND LIKE AN ULTRABEAST! Embiggens your Wojack to EPIC SIZE!

items.name: Tripoon
items.desc: Used by the most powerful Throaks to hunt prey, or something like that. Embiggens your Throak to EPIC SIZE!

items.name: RC Car
items.desc: Great for testing airbags and safety features! Embiggens your Snorble to EPIC SIZE!

items.name: Binoculars
items.desc: Giving this to a Satgat lets it see its house from here. Embiggens your Satgat to EPIC SIZE!

items.name: Hipster Bamglasses
items.desc: Are these cage-fed? Embiggens your Bamli to EPIC SIZE!

items.name: Sharp Whistle
items.desc: THIS PIERCES THE EARS. NOT THE LOBES, BUT... YOU KNOW... THE DRUMS. Embiggens your Shirk to EPIC SIZE!

items.name: Glazoo
items.desc: It's perfectly shaped to fit in the mouth of a Glaser! Embiggens your Glaser to EPIC SIZE!

items.name: Trampoline
items.desc: Give that Slurb a trampoline. Slurbs love trampolines. Embiggens your Slurb to EPIC SIZE!

items.name: Barbell
items.desc: This lyff lifts, broh. Embiggens your Lyff to EPIC SIZE!

items.name: Cooler
items.desc: Play it cool, crabby. CRABBY COOL! COOL CRAB COOL CAKES! Embiggens your Blastcrab to EPIC SIZE!

items.name: Insulated Sweater
items.desc: This will protect the electroneck of your glorious GULANTI! Embiggens your Gulanti to EPIC SIZE!

items.name: Galvanized Ribcage
items.desc: BE SELF-CONSCIOUS OF YOUR RIBCAGE NO MORE! Embiggens your Gallum to EPIC SIZE!

items.name: Grenamel Sleeper
items.desc: It's like sleeping on a pillow made of gold. You'd think that'd be uncomfortable. WOULDN'T YOU.

items.name: Bluffy Bed
items.desc: Is this bed any better than any other bed? Does it matter? Why are we here? Is there a point to existence, or are we all just a cosmic accident?

items.name: Squair
items.desc: This would be softer if you did more squats. But then, the whole world would be softer, WOULDN'T IT?

items.name: Squable
items.desc: BEHOLD THE MIGHT OF SQUABLE!

items.name: Myelar Lazychair
items.desc: It's so well insulated, it'd be nearly impossible to be tased in the butt while sitting in it.

items.name: Myelar Table
items.desc: The squishiness of Myelar makes for a terrible writing surface. Good thing you don't have any pencils or paper!

items.name: Snorby Airchair
items.desc: It's like putting your butt on a cloud. A cloud made of air.

items.name: Snorby Pufftable
items.desc: It takes a lot of LUNG POWER to keep this thing inflated. Inflabed. In... Infilgrated.

items.name: Grenamel Buttrest
items.desc: It's so dang smooth you can see your butt's reflection in it!

items.name: Grenamel Flattable
items.desc: This table is the flattest surface in the known universe. It's so flat, you could put a glass on it if you use a coaster.

items.name: Antler Pongtable
items.desc: Perfect for an outing with the rambunctious gents who all live in that one house down the street!

items.name: Antler Lawnchair
items.desc: Not actually suitable for use on lawns. Chair not liable for serious injury or death.

items.name: Fuzzy Hotchair
items.desc: The fuzz keeps your rear-end nice and toasty!

items.name: Bulgy Podtable
items.desc: The slightest poke would cause it to rupture, possibly with force of up to millions of tons of dynamite.

items.name: Wobbly Redtable
items.desc: Triangles are nature's most elegant wobbly shapes.

items.name: Pointy Awesomechair
items.desc: You could easily impale almost any body part on almost any part of this amazing chair!

items.name: Squee Seedbomb
items.desc: Take your Squee gardening to the next level. LEVEL UP! SQUEEEEE! Deals 125% of your DPS as physical damage.

items.name: Nurva Seedbomb
items.desc: This seedbomb really gets on people's... nurva. HEEEEEEH. Deals 125% of your DPS as physical damage.

items.name: Artree Seedbomb
items.desc: Don't get your fingers caught in the Blubes, as they say. Deals 125% of your DPS as physical damage.

items.name: Hairy Seedbomb
items.desc: This baby will put hair into everything's chest. Deals 125% of your DPS as physical damage.

items.name: Spur Seedbomb
items.desc: Why grow spurs when you can EXPLODE THEM AT THINGS? Deals 125% of your DPS as physical damage.

items.name: Furgrasp Seedbomb
items.desc: GRASP AHOY! Deals 125% of your DPS as physical damage.

items.name: Flailtree Seedbomb
items.desc: Be careful not to flay yourself when this bad boy goes off! Deals 125% of your DPS as physical damage.

items.name: Pipedirt Seedbomb
items.desc: It's about to get piping hot in here. Deals 125% of your DPS as physical damage.

items.name: Alloyonite Stable
items.desc: Probably the fluffiest, bluffiest creature bed on the entire planet. Aside from the fluffy warmth of your love, that is.

items.name: Bleghy Stable
items.desc: It's squishy, wet, and moderately lumpy. PERFECT FOR A PET TO LIVE IN!

items.name: Horn of Megalari
items.desc: A fragment of the horn of the ancient and mysterious Megalari. The Polari believe it has MAGICAL PROPERTIES!

items.name: Clamphitheatre
items.desc: This half-shell comes from deep in the frigid waters of the Tundra. At least... at least 10 or 12 feet deep.

items.name: Polari Horn Sharpener
items.desc: Gotta keep those babies nice and sharp.

items.name: Polari Hornlamp
items.desc: The horn is from a fallen Polari, and the light comes from that Polari's soul. It's a pretty depressing lamp.

items.name: Fat Beatdrum
items.desc: The beats that emerge from this drum are so fat, they could definitely stand to spend some time in the gym.

items.name: Baby Beatdrum
items.desc: For when fat beats just aren't appropriate.

items.name: Bleghsketball
items.desc: Dunking will be difficult in the gravity of this planet, and also without knees or a hoop.

items.name: Gyroball
items.desc: Sure, it's hard as a ball of concrete, and as heavy as one, but... You know.

items.name: Larvy Sackball
items.desc: It's spongy, yet bouncy, like the skin of some larvae stitched together. Because that's what it is.

items.name: Flashfizzbang
items.desc: This contraption is packed full of lightning! Summons a lightning storm at the target location for 100% of your DPS for 7 seconds.

items.name: The Big One
items.desc: It's pretty dang big, and it explodes pretty dang big, too! Flings out three other bombs, and also deals 100% of your DPS as physical damage.

items.name: Harvestbomb Mk2
items.desc: A more powerful harvestbomb, for breaking apart all kinds of stuff! Breaks apart all Mk1 resources, plus Flatboulders, Squees, and Dusk Crystals!

items.name: Harvestbomb Mk3
items.desc: More powerful than its weaker cousin, this bomb is powerful, and not weak. Breaks apart all Mk2 resources, plus Nurvas!

items.name: Harvestbomb Mk4
items.desc: For when you need to chop things, but don't want to chop things! Breaks apart all Mk3 resources, plus Artrees, Bone Spurs, Bawg Hairs, Furgrasps, Spireggs, and Smashblossoms!

items.name: Harvestbomb Mk5
items.desc: You could probably blow up the whole world with this thing. Breaks apart all Mk4 resources, plus Flunguss, Flailtrees, Pipedirts, and Magmite Mounds!

items.name: Fish Magnet
items.desc: When flung with the right wrist-flick, this will magnetically explode fish out of all fishing holes caught in its radius!

items.name: Chembobber
items.desc: This bobber will bob into Bawg or Savanna water and EXPLODE FISH RIGHT OUT OF THEIR SCHOOLS! Bobbly!

items.name: Pointy Pinwheel
items.desc: This little guy will help you tell whether the wind is blowing! Hint: it is.

items.name: Balloon Cluster
items.desc: Great for parties.

items.name: Depth Charge
items.desc: This came from somewhere... deep... And probably deals 300% of your DPS as physical damage!

items.name: Bawgsack
items.desc: It vibrates and pulses with squooshy mucus!

items.name: Megagong Lure
items.desc: By fusing together three powerful Gongs, you may just be able to fish up the legendary Megagong with this equipped!

items.name: The Megagong
items.desc: Level 37 Axe. This beast will make you the envy of every angler IN THE WHOLE DANG WORLD!

items.name: The Hydrablade
items.desc: You have heard legends of three Sawgrass blades stuck together... but you never imagined it could be so beautiful.

items.name: Ancient Watch Parts
items.desc: Some ancient civilization must have put this together. The parts are SUPER INTRICATE!

items.name: Oddly Shaped Crystal
items.desc: This crystal shard is shaped kinda like... an insect of some sort...

items.name: Facehugger
items.desc: It loves your face so much it's sickening.

items.name: The Chrono Shifter
items.desc: Slow down time for everything but yourself! And then punch everyone in the neck!

items.name: Blimpsack
items.desc: This Snorble sack is unusually durable and floaty. If only there were a use for something like that...

items.name: Mini Dirigible
items.desc: Why walk when you can BLIMP? Grants temporary flight for increased movement speed, and for traversing water!

items.name: The Everliving Pulp
items.desc: This spur pulp throbs with the ENERGIES OF LIFE!

items.name: The Blood Root
items.desc: Level 24 Hammer. Pulsatrating with the throbulent cardia of life, this hammer will kill everything.

items.name: Physics Research
items.desc: With this knowledge, you can put these papers INTO A FOLDER!

items.name: Spacetime Folder
items.desc: With the knowledge contained in this Spacetime Folder, you can fold spacetime to teleport yourself in battle!

items.name: Fatfish
items.desc: It's full of wonderful fish goodies!

items.name: Torso Demon
items.desc: It got caught in a Geysir vent and pulled from the underworld. KILL IT!

items.name: Torso Demon Skin
items.desc: It's rubbery, hot, and stretchy. It would make for a great coaster!

items.name: Demonic Boots
items.desc: Level 27 Legendary Pants. These will keep your toes so hot, you can't help but RUN LIKE THE WINGS OF THE WIND!

items.name: Ship Controls
items.desc: This is useful for making sure you stay in space!

items.name: Package
items.desc: Whatever is inside this, it had better be important.

items.name: Ship Floor
items.desc: It's a floor! From your ship.

items.name: Savannaporter
items.desc: Slapping this will suck you through space and drop you RIGHT SMACK in the Savanna!

items.name: Spaceporter
items.desc: Want to go to SPAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACE? Now you can.

items.name: Ship Tusk
items.desc: It keeps your ship pointed in the right direction using space magnets!

items.name: Volatile Sack
items.desc: There's something GOOFY about the sack of this Gassak gas sack sack. BETTER THROW IT AT SOMETHING FOR 175% OF YOUR DPS AS FIRE DAMAGE!

items.name: Crashed Flop Rocket
items.desc: Once majestically soaring through space, now majestically not soaring anywhere ever again.

items.name: Cryopod
items.desc: Keep it lubey in here, or you'll get stuck.

items.name: Space Chair
items.desc: This is where the space sits.

items.name: Space Table
items.desc: This table is so sturdy it can hold at least five or six spaces.

items.name: Spaceduck Spacepie
items.desc: Although mostly inedible, if you mix a spaceduck up with actual food, it makes for a FANTASTIC pie! Restores 162 HP.

items.name: Birdhouse
items.desc: This milkshake will bring all the birds to the yard.

items.name: Bubble Machine
items.desc: Because blowing bubbles yourself is far too time-consuming.

items.name: Bombcatcher
items.desc: Using gravity quantum particulate energy matrix multiplication, this little tool will cause you to not consume a bomb and incur no bomb cooldown 25% of the time when you throw it!

items.name: Karboambox
items.desc: Settle in for some smooth jazz, baby.

items.name: Cookie Jar
items.desc: WHO STOLE THE COOKIES FROM WITHIN THIS MAGNIFICENT JAR!?

items.name: Easel
items.desc: Fingerpainting would never be relevant, your mother always told you. Show her she was WRONG!

items.name: Rocketoob
items.desc: Be sure to point the fireworks end away from your parts.

items.name: Horizontal Blubelights
items.desc: In the event of a water landing, please follow the illuminated BLUBELIGHTS to your imminent doom.

items.name: Vertical Blubelights
items.desc: Follow the blubelights TO YOUR BLUBEY DESTINY!

items.name: Flower Arrangement
items.desc: IT'S AN ARRANGEMENT OF FLOWERS. THAT'S ALL IT IS. GET OVER IT.

items.name: Flubbery
items.desc: Probably one of the more flungus-like shrubberies you've seen, but it'll get the job done.

items.name: Gamebox
items.desc: There's a hole in the bottom... you put your games in there.

items.name: Genie Lamp
items.desc: You gotta rub it the right way, and then nothing happens. Genies aren't real, you weirdo.

items.name: Golden Catue
items.desc: Legends say if you put enough of these in your house, people will like you a lot less.

items.name: Blubber Burner
items.desc: With its ability to burn for up to eight moments, shirk blubber makes for a very versatile lamp!

items.name: Grenamel Dog Sculpture
items.desc: Definitely less maintenance than a non-grenamel dog sculpture.

items.name: Sackolantern
items.desc: WHY WOULD ANYONE MAKE THIS?

items.name: Sticky Hammok
items.desc: It will provide a good night's sleep, but you might need five showers in the morning.

items.name: Grandrogynous Clock
items.desc: Looking at this clock, you can't tell what time it is.

items.name: Shock Guard
items.desc: This INCREDIBLE INVENTION summons 3 lightning balls that will shock your enemies when you strike them for 70% of your dps!

items.name: Lumiball
items.desc: Excuse me, sir... your ball is glowing.

items.name: Pedometer
items.desc: It's so exciting to keep count of your steps, that every 50 steps you'll burst into a joyful sprint!

items.name: Polkadot Floor Covering
items.desc: This'll keep your little toesy woesies nice and comfy womfy!

items.name: Goldybank
items.desc: There's a hole in the top, so you can put your insanely huge piles of cash in there!

items.name: Welcome Mat
items.desc: Let your neighbors know they're welcome to take your mat with this mat that tells your neighbors they're welcome to take it!

items.name: Pipette Floor Covering
items.desc: Definitely one of the worst surfaces you've walked on, but what the HECK?

items.name: Unwelcome Mat
items.desc: Nothing says STAY OUT OF MY HOUSE better than this mat! Disclaimer: This mat does not speak.

items.name: Thermometer
items.desc: When you need to know how hot it is, the only way to tell is with a person-sized thermometer.

items.name: Cute Totem
items.desc: AWWWW WOOK AT ITS WIDDLE FACES! WWWOOOOOWOOWOOO!

items.name: Party Animal
items.desc: It's not a party until you ride in on one of these.

items.name: Crashing Escape Pod
items.desc: It's crashing into the ground!

items.name: Warping Effect
items.desc: Create the effect of warping through space!

items.name: Explosions Everywhere
items.desc: While this item is present on screen, explosions everywhere!

items.name: Cutscene Warping Through Space
items.desc: The cutscene showing the BS SS ASSESS traveling through space.

items.name: Cutscene Ship Destroyed
items.desc: Shows the cutscene of Hewgodooko destroying the BS SS Assess

items.name: Cutscene Escape Pod Launch
items.desc: Shows the cutscene of the escape pod launching from the exploding BS SS Assess

items.name: Power Crystal
items.desc: Legends say this power crystal was once wielded by a powerful elderly Indian man.

items.name: Battery
items.desc: This amazing device can power another amazing device for a short while!

items.name: Dish
items.desc: Waves of stuff bounce off the bowl shaped part and shoot out in directions toward things!

items.name: Comm Relay
items.desc: Great for communicating with the Bureau of Shipping! And probably other Bureaus also?

items.name: Entanglement Ring
items.desc: The Tendraam use these circular roots as a symbol of eternal bonding. Also can be used as garnish.

items.name: Hewgodooko Security Door
items.desc: This high-tech door requires a high-tech key!

items.name: Hewgodooko Security Key
items.desc: This high-tech key probably goes into a high-tech door!

items.name: Golden Key
items.desc: This key probably opens up a chest or something... something like that. WHO KNOWS?

items.name: Battle Music Jukebox
items.desc: This invisible item will override the normal music with BATTLE MUSIC while it's present on screen!

items.name: Supply Crate
items.desc: It's jam-packed with supplies!

items.name: Tendraam Legacy Root
items.desc: Tendraam carry roots of Maarla as their most sentimental personal possession. It seems PRETTY USELESS!

items.name: Stickybomb
items.desc: It sticks everything... TO DEATH! Deals 75% of your DPS as physical damage.

items.name: Elixir of Slashing
items.desc: Pour this tasty concoction onto your weapon to give it a chance to cause bleeding! 3% chance to cause enemies to bleed upon striking. Elixir lasts 20 minutes.

items.name: Elixir of Precision
items.desc: Drinking this pungent mixture innervates you with WILD ENERGY! Improves critical strike chance by 3%. Elixir lasts 20 minutes.

items.name: Elixir of Longevity
items.desc: Wompits are known to live up to 700 years. And now, SO CAN YOU! Regenerate 0.50% of max HP every 2 seconds. Elixir lasts 20 minutes.

items.name: Elixir of Venom
items.desc: Pouring this steamy blend onto your weapon will cripple your enemies! 3% chance to poison enemies upon striking. Elixir lasts 20 minutes.

items.name: Elixir of Antivenom
items.desc: By repeatedly dosing yourself with sunshroom chunks, you become more resistant to LITERALLY EVERY POISON EVER. Reduces poison damage taken by 15%. Elixir lasts 20 minutes.

items.name: Elixir of Sprints
items.desc: When the bottle touches your lips, you feel all tingly in your jibblies. 3% chance to gain turbo speed upon striking per second. Elixir lasts 20 minutes.

items.name: Elixir of the Spood Beast
items.desc: Spood Beasts have never been more tasty! Improves run speed by 5%. Elixir lasts 20 minutes.

items.name: Elixir of Insulation
items.desc: Drinking this makes your skin feel rubbery and wubbery! Reduces electric damage taken by 15%. Elixir lasts 20 minutes.

items.name: Acidic Fish Food
items.desc: Tossing this sweet little thing into the acid of the Bawg will attract a new school of fish!

items.name: Frozen Fish Food
items.desc: It can withstand extreme pressures AND extreme cold! This will attract new schools of fish in the Tundra!

items.name: Minitoomah
items.desc: It wriggles and tries to grab onto stuff with tiny tendrils.

items.name: Dead Minitoomah
items.desc: It doesn't have even a glimmer of life left in its bones.

items.name: Ynnix Artifact Top Fragment
items.desc: It shimmers and glursts with GLORIOUS YNNIX ENERGY!

items.name: Ynnix Artifact Bottom Fragment
items.desc: Is it REALLY the bottom if you flip it around? Yes, it is.

items.name: Baary Trophy
items.desc: This would definitely impres your house guests, if anyone would ever come to visit...

items.name: Baconweed Fairy Trophy
items.desc: Because the Baconweed Fairy was too beautiful to be forgotten.

items.name: Blockstock Trophy
items.desc: Much like the original, it is hard as a rock and ruthless.

items.name: Elixir of Warmth
items.desc: This delicious brew warms the very cockles of your soul. Reduces ice damage taken by 15%. Elixir lasts 20 minutes.

items.name: Krakalaka
items.desc: It uses pure KRAKENERGY to pry open even the toughest of packages.

items.name: Empty Krakalaka
items.desc: This Krakalaka is waiting to devour every package.

items.name: Goldbait Snare
items.desc: The ideal way to catch something that loves... GOOOOLD!

items.name: EMG Trophy
items.desc: In honor of you whooping some serious rockbutt.

items.name: IHO Trophy
items.desc: This hovering object was identified, and now... IT IS NO MORE!

items.name: Jessica Trophy
items.desc: Her horribleness will no longer strike fear into the hearts of... well, pretty much anyone!

items.name: Poteti Trophy
items.desc: When it comes to poteting, this poteti just couldn't potet.

items.name: Toomah Trophy
items.desc: If it comes back, you'll just have to STAB IT AGAIN! AND AGAIN! AND AGAIN AND AGAIN. AND AGAIN. AND... AGAIN.

items.name: Ynnix Trophy
items.desc: It was a tricky opponent, but not as tricky as you! OR WAS IT? Is this a trick? No, of course not. OR IS IT?

items.name: The Lens Left Fragment
items.desc: It crackles with energy, though it seems somehow subdued.

items.name: The Lens Right Fragment
items.desc: A chunk of the legendary Lens. You wonder what would happen if all the pieces came together...

items.name: The Lens Top Fragment
items.desc: The top portion of the legendary Lens. Just being near it fills you with a sense of heroism and wonder.

items.name: Flop Rocket Takeoff Cutscene
items.desc: Will and Brad abandon Flux on Woanope!

items.name: Whirlstone
items.desc: It makes you very sleepy.

items.name: Juicejockey VacuHelm
items.desc: Level 37 Helm. Made from the finest space materials, this helm can protect your head parts from just about anything!

items.name: Smash Racket
items.desc: Holding this racket infuses your body with the power of a thousand quadropi. Use it to smash your enemies into wet, fishy dust!

items.name: The Orb of Forn
items.desc: This orb has seen a lot of use. Veeru technology lasts forever, though. So... NO PROBLEM!

items.name: The Bubbler
items.desc: These little guys seem to endlessly reproduce through mitosis. Every 20 seconds, a new Bubbly appears and follows you. If it gets close to an enemy, it will explode for 200% of your dps!

items.name: Bingo Ball
items.desc: Although it looks like a regular tennis ball, it is extremely dense.

items.name: Quantum Electrodongle
items.desc: It's the part of a ship that makes the ship not explode.

items.name: Goldinox Wreckage
items.desc: Dependable. Rugged. Golden. Destroyed.

items.name: Final Cutscene
items.desc: The final cutscene of the game!

items.name: Landed Flop Rocket
items.desc: It's unclear why the Bureau would send this unreliable prototype as a Package Rescue vehicle, but... there it is.

items.name: Space Debris
items.desc: It's space debris from a space explosion!

items.name: Fully Loaded Krakalaka
items.desc: It's about to blow! Or... suck? Whatever, it's going to throw some packages through a wormhole.

items.name: Credits Cutscene
items.desc: Shows the credits for the game.

items.name: Seerfish
items.desc: Look into its eyes. You will see... What you mean to this fish.

items.name: Hewgodooko Trophy
items.desc: It's kind of a big deal.

items.name: Gravestone Vacuum
items.desc: It marks where you died, and sucks up all your loot!

items.name: Tundra Respawner
items.desc: If this item is present on-screen, the character will be forced to teleport to the Tundra upon death.

items.name: Cheering Sounds
items.desc: If this is present on-screen, there will be cheering sounds.

items.name: Memory Towelette
items.desc: This gentle nappy will absorb the memory of a stabled pet's name, allowing you to rename the pet. Just tear open and use!

items.name: Potted Clossom
items.desc: Turns out all you have to do is JAM IT IN THERE!

items.name: Tenacity Memorial
items.desc: Yeah, you got murdered a lot, but now you have this cool statue! So... that's good.

items.name: Pot Slapper
items.desc: By whipping some Clossoms around, you can slap potted plants right out of their pots! Insta-harvests all adjacent potted plants.

items.name: Pot Slapper Beamer
items.desc: Because individually slapping pot slappers is for chumps. Now you can laser them all at once!

items.name: Wojack Petalfloor
items.desc: You can feel poison residue soaking into your feet while you walk on it. It's nice!

items.name: Watfur Floor
items.desc: It's so dense it probably won't even soak up all the juice that's going to get spilled on it!

items.name: Hairbark Floor
items.desc: You'd think it would be soft and silky, and IT DEFINITELY IS.

items.name: Exofloor
items.desc: It's quite sturdy, despite all the sharp edges that constantly cut into your toes.

items.name: Strange Floor
items.desc: It's not clear where this fur came from, but it makes for a great carpet!

items.name: Bluffluffloor
items.desc: For when you need to blind your house guests!

items.name: Throak Tentafloor
items.desc: Sticky, but satisfying.

items.name: Gogos South
items.desc: Standing on this will push you! To the south!

items.name: Gogos North
items.desc: Standing on this will push you! To the north!

items.name: Gogos East
items.desc: Standing on this will push you! To the east!

items.name: Gogos West
items.desc: Standing on this will push you! To the west!

items.name: Gomos North
items.desc: Standing on this will push you SUPER FAST! To the north!

items.name: Gomos South
items.desc: Standing on this will push you SUPER FAST! To the south!

items.name: Gomos East
items.desc: Standing on this will push you SUPER FAST! To the east!

items.name: Gomos West
items.desc: Standing on this will push you SUPER FAST! To the west!

items.name: Demo End Item
items.desc: Dev use only!

items.name: Juice Crystal Cluster
items.desc: Some of the juice inside Woanope has crystallized and burst through the planet's crust. HEY, FREE JUICE!

items.name: Juiceforge
items.desc: This machine should allow you to harness the power of Crystallized Juice so you can modify your equipment!

items.name: Jar of Joom
items.desc: Turns out if you mix a bunch of poisonous stuff together, the result is still poisonous! Boosts your poison damage by 20%.

items.name: Burny Lidflipper
items.desc: When you flip the lid back, fire comes out! It's cutting edge technology! Boosts your fire damage by 20%.

items.name: Juice Conduit
items.desc: It's finely tuned to the Juice Frequencies of Woanope! Boosts your electric damage by 20%.

items.name: Freezy Handpoker
items.desc: It's so cold that you can't feel it when it pokes you! CONVENIENT! Boosts your ice damage by 20%.

items.name: Idol of Plagoo
items.desc: Legends say if you wield the power of Plagoo, you should wear extra deodorant. Boosts your poison damage by 30%.

items.name: Electro Fuzz-Knuckles
items.desc: If your knuckles aren't hairy enough to generate static, sometimes you gotta find a workaround. Boosts your electric damage by 30%.

items.name: Everfire Lampbox
items.desc: It's so hot, you get sweaty just from thinking about it. Then again, you get sweaty for no reason. Boosts your fire damage by 30%.

items.name: Coldy Spinpopper
items.desc: Being near it fills your heart with ice. It's probably fatal. Boosts your ice damage by 30%.

items.name: Graxe
items.desc: Level 1 Axe. This is theoretically an axe. Practically, who's to say?

items.name: Deadwood
items.desc: Level 1 Hammer. Wood on a stick! There's no end to your creative genius!

items.name: Ribber
items.desc: Level 2 Sword. One of the top five most sophisticated weapons ever conceived.

items.name: Footmallet
items.desc: Level 2 Hammer. Punching faces with feet has never been easier!

items.name: Marrow
items.desc: Level 3 Axe. Ever rib something in the rib with a rack of ribs?

items.name: Gladiem
items.desc: Level 3 Sword. If you swing it exactly wrong, it'll shatter into a thousand pieces. So don't do that!

items.name: Jabtooth
items.desc: Level 5 Sword. Also doubles as a knee-scratcher!

items.name: Crackerwhack
items.desc: Level 5 Hammer. If you think it hurts to get hit by a ball of Chitin, well.. You're exactly right!

items.name: Blastaxe
items.desc: Level 7 Axe. It squeaks like a balloon when you rub your hands on it!

items.name: Squenace
items.desc: Level 7 Sword. The jagged edges make it harder to use, but beauty is pain, you know?

items.name: Femaul
items.desc: Level 9 Hammer. These femurs are probably not priceless fossils or anything like that.

items.name: Sharpshell
items.desc: Level 11 Sword. If you run your finger along the edge of it, you feel awesome.

items.name: Slamjamma
items.desc: Level 11 Hammer. If you slamma, be sure to jamma. This maintains balance in the universe.

items.name: Jollystick
items.desc: Level 13 Axe. It's a bit sticky, but... in a good way.

items.name: Dubchete
items.desc: Level 13 Sword. Legends say the Dubchete is twice as long as a Monochete.

items.name: Spine
items.desc: Level 15 Axe. It has extra pointy parts, for safety!

items.name: Thumparoonie
items.desc: Level 15 Hammer. Don't even think about doing regular thumps with this. Always add the roonie.

items.name: Stinga
items.desc: Level 17 Sword. If you point at people with this, they become disgruntled. Pointing is rude.

items.name: Whisper
items.desc: Level 17 Hammer. It insults the enemy with a barely audible voice that makes them feel both enraged and confused.

items.name: Delouser
items.desc: Level 19 Axe. Your louse problems are now a thing of the past! Also the future.

items.name: Paink
items.desc: Level 19 Sword. It is so pointy, you can pierce several different kinds of things with it.

items.name: Vampaxe
items.desc: Level 21 Axe. Circles covered in spikes are the strongest shape.

items.name: Plonkbonk
items.desc: Level 21 Hammer. The mouth is there in case it gets hungry.

items.name: Comb
items.desc: Level 23 Sword. The perfect adventuring companion for any uncomfortably combative stylist.

items.name: Rake
items.desc: Level 25 Sword. Extremely effective, despite always being stuck on something.

items.name: Tamboraxe
items.desc: Level 25 Axe. You notice that if you drum it with your fingers, people avoid eye contact with you.

items.name: Pinch
items.desc: Level 27 Axe. If it catches the light just right, it appears to be winking at you.

items.name: Blambox
items.desc: Level 27 Hammer. Its perfect squareness helps you feel at peace with the chaos of the universe.

items.name: Reticulator
items.desc: Level 29 Sword. Also useful for slicing through hard-crusted bread.

items.name: Hollow
items.desc: Level 29 Hammer. You can keep your medicinal herbs in there!

items.name: Flatchet
items.desc: Level 31 Axe. Sometimes you have to get creative and play the hand you're dealt.

items.name: Lyffshank
items.desc: Level 31 Sword. You get the feeling that if you use this to shank someone, they will be offended.

items.name: Full Stop
items.desc: Level 33 Axe. This bad boy will sentence your enemies to their end. Period.

items.name: Dearthmaul
items.desc: Level 33 Hammer. It's red, to distract your opponents from how incredible you look!

items.name: The Eye
items.desc: Level 35 Sword. It can't actually see, but still... it knows.

items.name: The Fist
items.desc: Level 35 Hammer. You have gotten quite handy with your Lonsdaelite crafting skills!

items.name: Axe Box
items.desc: Drop one of these in combat, and BOOM! Now you can work from home! Rapidly chops back and forth for 4 seconds, dealing total damage equal to 400% of your DPS.

moves.name: Tooth Meteor Shower
moves.desc: Calls down a rain of exploding teeth from the heavens.

moves.name: Bacon Nap
moves.desc: Take a short nap, replenishing health.

moves.name: Homing Teeth
moves.desc: Fires a series of fast-moving, homing teeth at the target.

moves.name: Canonball
moves.desc: Flies up into the air and smashes down, causing area damage.

moves.name: Meditation
moves.desc: Summon a series of glowing death balls.

moves.name: Gravity Anchor
moves.desc: Drops an attackable gravity generator that pulls the player toward it.

moves.name: Healing Turret
moves.desc: Summons an attackable robot that heals Hewgodooko.

moves.name: Finger Blast
moves.desc: Flips up his helm finger turret and shoots a laser beam that pursues the player.

moves.name: Laser Drones
moves.desc: Summons a bunch of laser orbs that float high above ground, sweeping the area and blasting the ground below with lasers.

moves.name: Sweeping Laser Spin
moves.desc: Fires lasers and sweeps them in a circle, forcing the player to run within the safe zones.

moves.name: Ground Pound
moves.desc: Repeatedly smashes the ground, attempting to crush the player.

moves.name: Proximity Bombaroonies
moves.desc: Randomly flings out a handful of bombs which will explode when the player approaches them, or after a few seconds.

moves.name: Grand Slam
moves.desc: Sends a shockwave of stone outward, damaging everything in a large radius.

moves.name: Deploy Pebblies
moves.desc: Summons a group of pebble minions that attempt to damage the player.

moves.name: Regular Old Punches
moves.desc: Punches the player in the face. Repeatedly.

moves.name: Los Manos Calientes
moves.desc: Summons two giant hands that create a wave of fiery death between them.

moves.name: Fungus Bawmb
moves.desc: Baary flips his head back and barfs a volley of fungus bombs into the air.

moves.name: Zagslide
moves.desc: Baary folds up and tries to powerslide through his target.

moves.name: Summon Spores
moves.desc: Baary wiggles his voodoo arms and creates a bunch of spores that pump out constant damage.

moves.name: [Head] Fireball
moves.desc: Jessica opens her mouth and launches a ball of flame.

moves.name: [Head] Enraged Charge
moves.desc: Jessica's head detaches and flies toward the player.

moves.name: [Segment] Mortar Launch
moves.desc: One of Jessica's segments launches an explosive mortar.

moves.name: [Segment] Exhale Poison
moves.desc: One of Jessica's segments creates a poison cloud around itself.

moves.name: [Segment] Lay Eggs
moves.desc: One of Jessica's segments lays an egg which hatches into a little beast!

moves.name: Dervish
moves.desc: Turns into a whirling mass and flings projectiles toward the player.

moves.name: Inflation Bomb
moves.desc: Inflates its body and spawns a slow-moving, deadly energy ball.

moves.name: Copycat
moves.desc: The trickster creates two duplicates of itself, and each fires on the player.

moves.name: Void Bowels
moves.desc: Craps out some poison.

moves.name: Spawn Fleer
moves.desc: Summons a group of flying vomit monsters.

moves.name: Spawn Scamp
moves.desc: Summons a group of small, bitey monsters!

moves.name: Spawn Arti
moves.desc: Summons a group of stationary artillery minions.

moves.name: Ancestral Orbit
moves.desc: Summons three skulls that orbit the Poteti. If the player hits these, she will be poisoned, cut, or frozen.

moves.name: Anglerblast
moves.desc: Blasts the player with a laser that is SO HOT it also sets the player on fire.

moves.name: Dance Monkey
moves.desc: Poteti makes the player dance with a rapid-fire series of laser blasts.

moves.name: BFB
moves.desc: EMG shoots a huge missile out of his head and blasts the player with it.

moves.name: Mortar Time
moves.desc: EMG fires a series of mortars that leave hotspots of fire behind.

moves.name: Disco Eyes
moves.desc: EMG launches out one of its eyes, which follows the player and shoots her.

moves.name: Invulnerability Drone
moves.desc: IHO drops a drone that produces a shield. IHO will be invulnerable until the drone dies.

moves.name: Flame Drone
moves.desc: IHO drops a destructible drone that constantly pumpes out flames.

moves.name: Death Crusher of Death
moves.desc: IHO drops several death crushers onto the battlefield, which attempt to crush the player. To death.

moves.name: Cutter
moves.desc: IHO swoops through the player while spinning its blade.
